comment: Jis desh moderchod logonko congi paal ke rakha hai saal se use gandagi ki saag karneke liye sahansheel rehna padta hai aut moka dek ke laat maarna padta
amr:
# ::snt Jis desh moderchod logonko congi paal ke rakha hai saal se use gandagi ki saag karneke liye sahansheel rehna padta hai aut moka dek ke laat maarna padta
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / et-cetera
            :mode expressive
            :domain (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jis")))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hmm
                  :mode expressive)
            :op2 (h2 / hmm
                  :mode expressive)
            :op3 (u / use-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Gandagi")))
            :op4 u
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 p2)
      :op5 u
      :mode expressive
      :ARG1 p2
      :op6 (l / laugh-01
            :mode expressive)
      :op7 (r / rehna
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Hansheel")))
      :op8 (r2 / rehna
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Maarna"
                        :op2 "Padta")))
      :op9 (e2 / et-cetera
            :mode expressive))
